ygData.subject: Re: posting.
ygData.msgSnippet: I have always had respect for Shada, even though my bard is older than hers. I still respected her. =) ... From: Ryan Honeyman  To:
ygData.messageBody:
I have always had respect for Shada, even though my bard is older than hers.
I still respected her. =)
----- Original Message -----
From: Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Sunday, November 14, 1999 2:56 PM
Subject: [eqbards] posting.


From: Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...>


That last email conversation reminded me of a young Harmonic
and a 'snooty' Shada. I started laughing, after I thought
about it some more. Keep heart young level 22 bard who
thinks I'm on a high horse. I was right where you were
not so long ago. =)

( And now I have utmost respect for Shada, go figure ;p )

Harmonic, only STR 109, high horser, god?

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@... with
the subject lol.
